name: Stone Form
summary: You can transform your body into a pure primal manifestation of earth, an elemental.
description:
You can transform your body into a pure primal manifestation of earth, an elemental. Once per day, you can cast elemental form as a 7th-level primal innate spell, but you can only choose the earth elemental form.Traits

Oread: Oreads are planar scions descended from shaitans.
